Mission Orders

The ossugons are a menace and not to be trusted.

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:31#1#ossugon frostwalker} and {@LinkCreature:31#2#icelord}, as well as {@LinkCreature:31#4#icy skeletal minions} and {@LinkCreature:31#5#frosted skeletal thralls}.

Report to Celion when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
